mapper.select: select s.sche_no, s.sche_title, s.sche_date, trunc(to_date(s.sche_date)-sysdate) "d_day", rank() over (order by trunc(to_date(s.sche_date)-sysdate, 0) asc), s.sche_notice from schedule s, couple c where s.couple_num = c.couple_num and s.couple_num = #{couple_num}

SELECT s.sche_no, s.sche_title, s.sche_date, trunc(to_date(s.sche_date)-sysdate) "d_day", RANK() OVER (ORDER BY trunc(to_date(s.sche_date)-sysdate, 0) ASC) AS ranking, s.sche_notice FROM schedule s INNER JOIN couple c ON s.couple_num = c.couple_num WHERE s.couple_num = #{couple_num} AND trunc(to_date(s.sche_date)-sysdate) > 0
mapper.update: update schedule set sche_title = #{sche_title} where couple_num = #{couple_num} and sche_no = #{sche_no}
mapper.select: SELECT s.couple_num, c.create_date as create_date FROM couple c LEFT JOIN schedule s ON c.couple_num = s.couple_num WHERE c.couple_num = #{couple_num}
